MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  We are arranging to have engineers investigate the fault, and we hope to have your electricity restored by 03-DEC-2020 11:54.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the ST7 postcode area of Alsager. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:54am. Our engineers as well as a third party contractor are on their way to site to investigate and our teams will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:17am on the 3rd December 2020.
